title: ISic003457. Dedication to Venus Equestris
body:
1 [ L (ucius) ? Plinius? L (uci) ? f (ilius) ? Ruf?]us leg (atus) pro pr (aetore) pr (aetor) desig (natus) Veneri Eque [stri don (um) ? ded (it) ?]

1[..............]USLEGPROPRPRDESIGVENERIEQUE[............]

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Silvestrini 2014

English translation

[Lucius Plinius Rufus, son of Lucius] propraetorian legate, praetor designate, [gave this as a gift] to Venus Equestris

commentary

Silvestrini 2014 plausibly suggests that this is a dedication set up by L. Plinius L.f. Rufus, legatus pro praetore of Sextus Pompeius and praetor designate for 33 BC, already attested at Lilybaeum in ILLRP 426 = ISic000007. The inscription is referenced within AE 2007.678-679, although neither lemma there concerns this text.

bibliography

  • 2014.537 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • Silvestrini 2014 211-215 no.2 fig.5-6 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001581
  • Silvestrini 2024 424-425, figs. 438-439
